summary:
Skimpy gold armor.
3 pieces. Boots, bracers and body.
descriptionHtml:
1. This armor comes in 3 parts. Boots, bracers and body. UNP BBP body required.

2. Statistically equivalent to ebony. Body piece is lighter.

3. Upgradable and create-able at the Smith. Ebony smithing perk required. 

4. A free set  can be found in Whiterun smith (Warmaidens) above the counter area. See pic at top of page.

5. Is a new mesh. It wont replace anything.

6. To install, just extract the zip file to your Skyrim Data folder.



A PLEA/REQUEST FOR ANY BLENDER MODDERS...
If anyone knows how to get Blender to export Nif files of the body (in this case, UNP BBP) with their original skin partitions, please let me know. 
As it is, Blender will export 3 chaotic skin partitions for me (which I can see in Nifscope), instead of the original 2, clean and tidy ones for the UNP BBP body. This issues has caused me some headaches. Thankyou :)
author: cyric79
